channel.title: Why can i only fish at one specific Fountain?
channel.description:
[b]Why can i only fish at one specific fountain?!?!
also...
How can i change which fountain i can fish at.. lets say i want the fishing fountain to be one of the 3 in Camalot.[/b][br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 07:11:10 PM[/size][hr]c'mon please i need to know!!![br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 07:17:59 PM[/size][hr]btw im using testscape [br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 07:19:40 PM[/size][hr]O come on someone has to know!!! :(

item.title: Why can i only fish at one specific Fountain?
item.dc:creator: @CryptoScape CryptoScape
item.description:
@CryptoScape wrote:

now search for carb() until you find something like if item{item ID} use on object{OBJECT ID}

Read full topic
item.source: Why can i only fish at one specific Fountain?

item.title: Why can i only fish at one specific Fountain?
item.dc:creator: @Pioneer508 Pioneer508
item.description:
@Pioneer508 wrote:

oh thanks i didnt think about doing that[br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 07:54:26 PM[/size][hr]this is what came up when i searched for You catch a bass.

public void carb(){ if (actionTimer == 0) { addItem(363,1); sendMessage("You catch a bass."); addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[10]), 10); actionName = "carp"; actionTimer = 10; pEmote = 0x306; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } }

Now what? Theres no Object id anywhere in here…

Read full topic
item.source: Why can i only fish at one specific Fountain?

item.title: Why can i only fish at one specific Fountain?
item.dc:creator: @CryptoScape CryptoScape
item.description:
@CryptoScape wrote:

search for the text that comes up when u fish at the fountain,in client.java then loook for another fountain and change that Object ID into the one you want it to be,u can even make it so u can fish from a barrel

Read full topic
item.source: Why can i only fish at one specific Fountain?
